metadata.title: CVE-2018-19757 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: There is a NULL pointer dereference at function sixel_helper_set_additional_message (status.c) in libsixel 1.8.2 that will cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-2.1').
